content.question: For the purpose of determining the value of its end-of-year inventory, a clothing store creates a list at the end of the year of every item currently in stock along with each itemâ€™s wholesale price. Which of the following is the best description of the end-of-the-year activity?

choices.label: An experiment, because the items are treatments and wholesale prices are responses.
An experiment, because the store does not know the total wholesale price of all the items.
A sample survey, because the store wants to estimate the value of all items for the entire year.
A sample survey, because the items currently in the store at the end of the year are a random sample of all items in the store for the entire year.
A census, because the wholesale prices of all items are listed.

content.answer: A census, because the wholesale prices of all items are listed.
